name: 2X-3KPR (Tooex)
Lore: 'Simple maintenance and diagnostics droid. Activates alarm sensors, security lighting and power fences on remote installations. KPR servant droids built by Lerrimore Droids.',
Text: 'Where present under ''nighttime conditions,'' each of your Rebels and aliens at same planet site are power +2, and also have immunity to attrition < 3 if a Hydroponics Station is present.',
